https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/rdyIP1gnLCksB7Cziyn0ZHE2LoI.jpg On the face of it, theyâ€™re just another family moving to the wide open spaces of the Big Sky Country for a tree change. But for teenage Imogen Day and her parents Samantha and Will, the move to Montana is an escape from quite a unique kind of bullying. Desperate to make a new life for herself, Imogen must overcome new tormentors, old secrets, and a strange presence in the attic. Broken Ghost
